title: PBE
body:
I want to play league of legend in PBE server.
I have waited for 3 months.
Can you give me the chance to play league of legend in PBE?
I believe you to read this letter and you give the chance

replies.body:
Getting into the PBE is a waiting game for anyone who applies. We send invites out in waves, and typically look for really active players who are a positive influence on the community. The exact criteria for each wave of invites changes from time to time, but the basic criteria I mentioned is a good basis to understand how we choose testers. 

For can find our entire breakdown on the PBE [here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) Let me know if you have any questions.
